nodes.bodyText: This change is not necessary
nodes.diffHunk:

     def eeType = dotcmsReleaseVersion.equals("master") ? '-SNAPSHOT' : ''
 
-    compile group: 'com.dotcms.enterprise', name: 'ee', version: dotcmsReleaseVersion + eeType, changing: true

 	 */
 	void unarchive (Template template);
 
+	/**
+	 * Delete the specified template.
+	 *
+	 * Template should be archive, otherwise DotStateException
+	 * Should have write permission, otherwise SecurityException
+	 *

+	 * @param user     {@link User}

+	 * @throws DotSecurityException
